channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1528538464400068608
item.description:
En el Perú, en lo que va de mayo/2022: 137 provincias (de 196) han reportado CERO fallecidos por #COVID19
Vía #DatosAbiertos https://t.co/NVNC1qPJYi

item.title: #ja @ 1528536469047939072
item.description: マエスさんの熱い想いに感化され、Prepper Open Data Bankに法人番号関連オープンデータを搭載していくことにしました！ https://t.co/nST7uRD9Gu

item.title: #en @ 1528496256036835328
item.description: Hats off to @ChaoranChen_ for creating a powerful virus sequence API (originally for SARS-CoV-2) that can be quickly adapted to serve and analyze monkeypox sequences from @ncbi's Genbank. Fantastic software that shows what the benefits of truly open data are. https://t.co/SQnoPTD8s4

item.title: #en @ 1528476548935913472
item.description: PS Thanks to all the original contributors for sharing the genomic data as open data so quickly on https://t.co/yHcVcRX3s5 and https://t.co/aM9BsaJVOk. It's open data that allow sequence alignments etc to be shared for the benefit of all! https://t.co/ScR3MvdnPU

item.title: #en @ 1528466164036145152
item.description: As always, we are immensely grateful to those collecting, generating and generously sharing these #monkeypox sequences. It is due to this open data sharing that we are able to provide an open resource, with accessible genomes and metadata, for others to build upon. 3/7

item.title: #en @ 1528466157723713536
item.description: Using #opendata generously shared by @irj_pt and @CDCgov, we have launched https://t.co/cF2fxIxg84 to track genomic epidemiology of the emerging monkeypox virus outbreak. 1/7 https://t.co/plwSuVMdE7

item.title: #en @ 1528416547101876224
item.description:
I hinted at this coming a little earlier today 😉 - but want to really emphasize: this is what truly #opendata looks like. Enabling development of tools that are able to benefit everyone to do fast & effective research to underpin response & understanding
https://t.co/xCmgIsnsJi

item.title: #en @ 1528415584341397505
item.description: 🎉VERY excited🎊 to share news of the shiny new #monkeypox @GenSpectrum (previously CoV-Spectrum) website & API - allowing lightning-fast ⚡️ queries to get info on metadata & sequence information. As more #opendata sequences come in, this will be incredibly powerful! https://t.co/TjzZ4rQCsK

item.description: openly on @NCBI genbank and with us in real time! #OpenData 6/6

item.title: #es @ 1528384258842279936
item.description: Otras preguntas q tienen que ver con los datos abiertos del RNPDNO, se relacionan con qué información contendrá y cuando se hará publica. La Ley General prevé la creación de Lineamientos que regulan el funcionamiento del Registro, los cuales están en la fase final de construcción

item.title: #th @ 1528378806162972673
item.description: ชัชชาติพูดดีมาก ชัชชาติบอกว่า ถ้าเราจะมาบอกว่านโยบายนี้ทำก่อน (ข้าราชการ)ที่เหลือก็จะดีใจสิ (เพราะยังไม่ถึงตาตัวเอง) ไม่ได้ เราต้องทำทุกนโยบายพร้อมกันหมด เราต้องเอางานให้(ข้าราชการ)ทุกคนทำ นักข่าวถามอันไหนต้องทำก่อน ชัชชาติบอก อันที่ไม่ต้องของบเช่นเรื่อง open data แข็งแกร่งมาก

item.title: #es @ 1528033349272485889
item.description:

item.title: #en @ 1528019267089735681
item.description: PC is an open system that actively supports of open source software, open data, and open specifications with direct resources. We are excited to add our lidar expertise to the mix, and the data, software, and specifications they supported us to build will have lasting effect.

item.title: #en @ 1528012405426606088
item.description:

Huge shout-out to past and present team members such as @kannywan @krbrim_hfx @bjpoelaert and our partners in the @NIH ACTIVE TRACE program. https://t.co/uFI8n2N9cK

item.title: #es @ 1527834941098233858
item.description: 📌Es un gusto haber presenciado la Instalación de la #REDA2022, en mi natal #BajaCalifornia, donde se sumaron los municipios de #Tecate y @gobtijuanamx, ahora son parte del proyecto #InfraestructuraAbierta. Los #DatosAbiertos aportarán multíples beneficios en toda la sociedad. 👏 https://t.co/2XvHJDbL9K

item.title: #es @ 1527801345373220866
item.description:

✨¡Gracias por la invitación, @verificado_mx!✨ https://t.co/TsQiY0HIqE

item.title: #es @ 1527795054642880512
item.description:
La transparencia es fundamental en la #MediciónDePobreza y la evaluación de programas sociales, por ello el #CONEVAL impulsa una política de Datos Abiertos.
En el 9° episodio del #PódcastCONEVAL te explicamos en qué consiste.
¡Escúchanos! 🎧 https://t.co/731annbffN https://t.co/2voGfOElsG

item.title: #en @ 1527709321622167552
item.description:
Ever wonder if #EcoEvo researchers are getting better at sharing #opendata? And what predicts who shares (re)usable data?
We have answers :)

https://t.co/KStBXjazxt https://t.co/XsRzKKU3vW

item.title: #es @ 1527706710722355200
item.description:
Según los registros vía #DatosAbiertos el 30/04 fue la última vez que se aplicaron dosis de #AstraZeneca en el Perú.
Casi tres millones se han dejado de aplicar de las once millones distribuidas a nivel nacional.
¿Cuántas de esas tres millones habrán vencido?

item.title: #es @ 1527416887025487898

Seguir HILO🧵 https://t.co/TwaXdrmOvU

Personen met niet-westerse migratie achtergrond: 2016 2.096.592 2023 2.530.011 Dat is +433.419

item.title: #it @ 1527347692862869504
item.description: una fonte ufficiale di dati aperti di informazioni sulla spesa federale. Secondo il sito al 12 aprile 21, il governo degli Stati Uniti ha speso 3,63 trilioni di $ strabilianti "in risposta al COVID-19". Ma non sono le uniche informazioni sul Covid che si possono trovare sul sito.
